author: MSNBC
title: 'I don’t know how we survived': Family shot by Russian soldiers fearful of Nazis
description: Leaving their village near Ukraine's capital Kyiv, soldiers from Russia shot Tetyana Vlasenko and her family. She said they thought the cars were full of Nazis.
content: KYIV, Ukraine Tetyana Vlasenko was bleeding from 12 bullet wounds to her legs when she begged a Russian military officer nearby for help. His soldiers had opened fire on her familys car, yet the offi… [+3065 chars]
